name: Boat Sim
summary:
Blast around in a cool speed boat, go sailing in a fishing boat or be the skipper of a large car ferry!
Boat Sim is a boat simulation you can enjoy anytime!
Enjoy a scenic bay in a virtual speed boat, alongside fishing boats, sailing and other motor boats with lots of scenery and various docks and cities to visit, or take out your fishing boat at night, or try your hand at driving a car ferry between multiple docks!
By design there's no objectives, no score to get, simply relax and enjoy your speed boat, fishing boat and now car ferry.
